dialog.name: Oscar
dialog.text: Hi, can you connect me to 28 Sky Avenue?

dialog.name: Oscar
dialog.text: Hannah, it’s Oscar. The cake is currently baking, so nothing interesting as of yet.

dialog.name: Oscar
dialog.text: Ingredients were troublesome though, we are going to need some serious clean up. That’ll be left to you.

dialog.name: Hannah
dialog.text: Oscar... did you really have to reorganize an entire... aisle for the recipe.

dialog.name: Hannah
dialog.text: *Sighs*... Anyway, all good now just keep me informed. And why are using cake for this?

dialog.name: Oscar
dialog.text: Oh yeah... yeah. It’s just... well... you should come over and see this. It's not how I expected.

dialog.name: Hannah
dialog.text: Agh, understood. I’ll be there shortly.

dialog.name: Oscar
dialog.text: Right, I need to be connected to 42b Richter Road.

dialog.name: Hannah
dialog.text: Hello, can you connect me to 28 sky avenue please! it’s urgent!
